documentation.text:
@param _id : The identifier of the node that the owner wants to get rewards from.  
@dev This is the main function to get reward of node given its NodeId, before transferring to the owner
@param enableNodeCreation : Boolean to enable or disable the node creation

@param _id : The identifier of the node  
@dev This function is public so that it's not only called internally, but also as a query if needed.

@param node_type : The node type (Lava, Earth or Snow). Must be between 0 and 2 
@return  uint256 : The current node price for the given type
@param newTime  : The new min claim time that needs to be respected before claiming reward

@param account  : The address of the account that supposedly has nodes
@return uint256 : The number of nodes the account has

@param account  : The address of the account that supposedly has nodes
@return bool    : True if the account has at least one Node

documentation.text:
@param _id : The identifier of the node that the owner wants to get rewards from.  
@dev This is the main function to get reward of node given its NodeId, before transferring to the owner
@param enableNodeCreation : Boolean to enable or disable the node creation

@param _id : The identifier of the node  
@dev This function is public so that it's not only called internally, but also as a query if needed.

@param node_type : The node type (Lava, Earth or Snow). Must be between 0 and 2 
@return  uint256 : The current node price for the given type
@param newTime  : The new min claim time that needs to be respected before claiming reward

@param account  : The address of the account that supposedly has nodes
@return uint256 : The number of nodes the account has

@param account  : The address of the account that supposedly has nodes
@return bool    : True if the account has at least one Node

calculateRewards(uint256).details: This function calculates reward every time it's called. Contrary to classical Node SC,  we believe that this way of doing is more efficient gas-wise. The reward is calculated based on the last time it was claimed (or the first time the node was created), and on the daily reward.

createNode(uint256,uint256,address).details: This is the main function to create a node

params._amount: : The amount corresponding to the price of a the node
params._nodeType: : The node type (Lava, earth or snow). Should be a uint between 0 and 2s

getAllReward().details: This is the main function to get all rewards before transferring to the owner

getMountainNodeById(uint256).details: This function is public so that it's not only called internally, but also as a query if needed.

params.node_type: : The node type (Lava, Earth or Snow). Must be between 0 and 2

returns._0: uint256 : The current node price for the given type

getNodeReward(uint256).details: This is the main function to get reward of node given its NodeId, before transferring to the owner

params._id: : The identifier of the node that the owner wants to get rewards from.

params.account: : The address of the account that supposedly has nodes

returns._0: uint256 : The number of nodes the account has

params.account: : The address of the account that supposedly has nodes

returns._0: bool    : True if the account has at least one Node

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newTime: : The new min claim time that needs to be respected before claiming reward

params.enableNodeCreation: : Boolean to enable or disable the node creation

params.Earth: : The amount of tokens (respecting the decimals) of the Earth node
params.Lava: : The amount of tokens (respecting the decimals) of the Lava node
params.Snow: : The amount of tokens (respecting the decimals) of the Snow node

setRewardPerNode(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: The percentages are set with 100% corresponding to 1_000 (Meaning 10% = 100)

params.Earth: : The daily reward (in percentages) for the Earth node
params.Lava: : The daily reward (in percentages) for the Lava node
params.Snow: : The daily reward (in percentages) for the Snow node

transferNode(uint256,address,address).details: This function loops over the nodes of the owner and if it finds the node with given id, it removes it from the owner list and add it to the recipient's list of nodes

params._id: : The identifier of the node that the owner wants to to transfer
params._owner: : The owner of the node with given id
params._recipient: : The new owner of the node with given id

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferNode(uint256,address,address).notice: TODO : For now it is only doable by the owner of the contract
